programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP13) When a suspect from Murdoch's past pulls a deadly con, he orchestrates an elaborate sting so she won't get away with murder again.
Année : 2008
Réalisation : Sudz Sutherland
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Wendy Crewson (Cassie Chadwick) Johnston. Daiva (Eva Pearce) Giacomo Gianniotti (Leslie Garland)

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) We visit the Kamloops Waterski club and their adaptive clinic, where everyone has the opportunity to tip their toes in the water and try water skiing. Get on the water and take the disability out of the sport.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP08) In the episode of Dish with Mary, Mary visits Chef Kyle Bruce, owner of the 2x4 Diner in Wainfleet, Ont. Chef Kyle shares his journey from working for NORAD to attending culinary school in Vancouver.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP06) Elizabeth doubts her feelings for Jack when a visitor from her hometown comes to Hope Valley. Abigail is unsure how to assist her daughter-in-law. Bill probes further into an undercover investigation.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary "Rosie" LeVeaux) Kavan Smith (Leland "Lee" Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: Evening the Odds
programme.desc:
Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.
Année : 2014

programme.title: No Vacancy: Vancouver Housing Crisis
programme.desc:
Host Grant Hardy investigates the impact of Metro Vancouver's housing crisis on people with disabilities and how it is challenging city planners, architects and governments. Grant also reveals solutions being tested to help address the crisis.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP11) After a young girl is abducted from her bed, Murdoch is stunned to discover that a talking doll left at the scene has a recorded message directed at him.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Depictions of the sex lives of people with disabilities are almost non-existent in pop culture. Rachele asks why, and sets out on a mission to change it.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) Emilee is done with her girl-next-door look. But as someone who is partially sighted, she's unsure about navigating fashion and beauty on her own. She wants tips, tricks and hacks on how to put together a professional, polished look independently.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Frankie Drake: détective privée
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) Frankie and Trudy go undercover in the glamorous world of film in order to solve a seemingly impossible murder on a silent movie set.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
(S10EP06) When Amy helps a mounted archer reconnect with her horse, she also unravels the mystery behind Spartan's recent behavior.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2017

Année : 2017

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2017

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story
programme.desc:
Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story examines the background and career of Patrick Anderson, arguably the greatest wheelchair basketball player of all time as he prepares for the 2020 Paralympic Games in Tokyo.
Année : 2017
